resources.string: PushFit is an application that helps you count the number of push ups you\'ve done in a day. With PushFit, you can customize how frequently you want to workout.

"Its easy! You only have to click the start button to start doing Push ups. There are two options for counting your push ups.
With the Countdown Timer option selected, when the time you specified ends, you\'ll be prompted to enter the number of push ups you recorded. This value is saved so you can view later on. For Sensor Counter, you set the minimum number of push ups you can do, when you click the start button, you place your device just beneath your head, your push ups is counted and saved when you reach the specified amount of pushups. "
